jd: From: Subhash Tamta, Convextech.inc subhash@convextech.com Reply to: subhash@convextech.com 🚀 Job Title: Python/AWS Engineer📍 Location: Hybrid in Plano, TX or Richmond, VA, or McLean, VA⏳ Duration: 6 months📋 Visa: No H1B/CPTJob Description🔥 Must be a former Capital One employee and eligible for rehire!We are seeking an experienced Python/AWS Engineer for a 6-month hybrid role with TEK Global Services.
